name: TeleFinity WebRTC to SIP Gateway
author: TeleFinity

sections.description: Using TeleFinity WebRTC to SIP Gateway (TFWebRTC), you can turn your website into a phone device. It will allow your website visitors to place a call directly to your existing Call Manager/Call Center or traditional PBX from anywhere at zero-cost. TeleFinity WebRTC to SIP Gateway is available on the cloud as a service as well as on-premises. Our cloud WebRTC to SIP Gateway simplifies the implementation as well as speeds it up. It can be activated in less than 2 minutes. Simultaneously, the on-premises are available when your organizational policy requests it to be implemented within the organization’s data center.
sections.installation:
1. Upload telefinity-webrtc-sip-gateway.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings >
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial version

1.1

  • Fix: Load the script when document loading is slow

short_description: Turns your website into a phone and let your abroad customers connect to your PBX /Call Center directly at zero-cost and without a telecom operator.
